item.title: 保险业巨头承认犯有 20 亿美元欺诈和洗钱罪
item.description: 美国司法部周二表示，保险业巨头格雷格-林德伯格（Greg Lindberg）已认罪，承认自己通过位于北卡罗来纳州、百慕大群岛、马耳他和其他地方的公司网络实施了一项价值 20 亿美元的欺诈和洗钱计划。【原文：The U.S. Justice Department said on Tuesday that insurance magnate Greg Lindberg had pleaded guilty to a $2 billion fraud and money laundering scheme operated through a network of companies based in North Carolina, Bermuda, Malta, and elsewhere.】

item.title: 据《华尔街日报》报道，精神航空准备申请破产
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》援引知情人士的话报道，在与边疆航空公司（Frontier Airlines）的合并谈判破裂后，精神航空公司正准备申请破产保护。【原文：Spirit Airlines is preparing to file for bankruptcy protection after merger talks with Frontier Airlines broke down, the Wall Street Journal reported, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，美国正在审查瑞银从瑞士信贷接管的俄罗斯账户
item.description: 三位熟悉内情的人士称，美国正在对瑞银收购瑞士信贷时吸纳的俄罗斯客户进行调查，从而加强了对全球最大财富管理公司之一的审查。【原文：The United States is pursuing an inquiry into Russian clients that UBS took on when it bought Credit Suisse, three people familiar with the matter said, heightening scrutiny of one of the world's biggest wealth managers.】

item.title: 独家报道：Blackstone 以 3 亿美元投资支持 Brigade，用于私人信贷和 CLO
item.description: 两位熟悉此事的人士称，对冲基金 Brigade Capital 将获得 Blackstone 3 亿美元的投资，以帮助其建立新的私人信贷策略并扩展其抵押贷款债务 (CLO) 平台。【原文：Hedge fund Brigade Capital is receiving a $300 million investment from Blackstone to help build its new private credit strategy and expand its collateralized loan obligations (CLO) platform, two people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 亚洲在美国 CPI 前兑现特朗普赌注
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 纽约联储主席佩里仍认为货币市场流动性充裕
item.description: 纽约联储一位高级官员周二表示，即使最近出现了一些波动，但货币市场的流动性水平似乎仍然保持强劲。【原文：Even with some recent bouts of volatility, it appears money market liquidity levels still remain robust, a top New York Federal Reserve official said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，苹果最快将于 3 月发布人工智能墙平板电脑
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引知情人士的话报道，苹果公司正计划推出一款壁挂式显示器，它可以控制电器、处理视频会议，并使用人工智能来导航应用程序。【原文：Apple is planning on launching a wall-mounted display that can control appliances, handle video conferencing and use artificial intelligence to navigate apps, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing people with knowledge of the effort.】

item.title: 里维安与大众汽车集团成立价值 58 亿美元的合资企业
item.description: Rivian 和大众汽车集团于本周二成立了合资企业，该企业于今年 6 月宣布成立，价值 58 亿美元，双方将共享软件和电动汽车架构。【原文：Rivian and Volkswagen Group launched on Tuesday the joint venture they had announced in June, valued at $5.8 billion, to share software and electric vehicle architecture.】

item.title: Flutter 因美国市场以外的蓬勃发展而上调指导价
item.description: 本周二，全球最大的在线博彩公司 Flutter 连续第二个季度上调了全年业绩指引，原因是其非美国品牌第三季度的收入增长好于预期。【原文：Flutter , the world's largest online betting company, nudged up its full-year guidance for the second successive quarter on Tuesday after its non-U.S. brands drove better than expected third quarter revenue growth.】

item.title: Instacart 预测第四季度消费者支出不振，业绩疲软
item.description: Instacart周二预计，本季度交易总额（GTV）和核心利润将低于预期，这表明在通胀高企的情况下，在线杂货和食品配送的支出可能会在假日季节有所回落。【原文：Instacart on Tuesday forecast current-quarter gross transaction value (GTV) and core profit below estimates, in signs that spending on online grocery and food deliveries could temper in the holiday season amid sticky inflation.】

item.title: 因成本削减和用户稳定增长，Spotify 预测利润高于预期
item.description: 音频流媒体巨头 Spotify 周二预测第四季度利润高于华尔街预期，押注于成本削减和关键假日季的强劲用户增长，盘后股价上涨 7.7%。【原文：Audio-streaming giant Spotify forecast fourth-quarter profit above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, betting on cost cuts and strong subscriber growth in the crucial holiday season, sending its shares up 7.7% after the bell.】

item.title: 澳大利亚顶级银行 CBA 在成本和竞争困境中盈利持平
item.description: 澳大利亚联邦银行（Commonwealth Bank of Australia）周三表示，其第一季度现金收益基本持平，但指出残酷的贷款竞争和成本上升导致利润率波动。【原文：Commonwealth Bank of Australia said on Wednesday its first-quarter cash earnings remained largely flat, but flagged that cut-throat lending competition and rising costs were causing volatility in margins.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，OpenAI 联合创始人格雷格-布罗克曼（Greg Brockman）重返人工智能初创公司
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二援引一位熟悉内情的人士的话报道，OpenAI 联合创始人格雷格-布罗克曼（Greg Brockman）在辞去总裁职务三个月后重返这家人工智能初创公司。【原文：OpenAI co-founder Greg Brockman has returned to the artificial intelligence startup three months after taking a leave from his role as president, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday, citing a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局禁止美国航空公司在飞机遭枪击后从海地起飞
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周二表示，在周一两架商用喷气式客机遭枪击后，将禁止美国航空公司在海地运营 30 天。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Tuesday it will bar U.S. airlines from operating in Haiti for 30 days after two commercial jetliners were struck by gunfire on Monday.】

item.title: H&R Block 就美国联邦贸易委员会对 "免费 "申报声明和客户降级的指控达成和解
item.description: H&R Block 同意支付 700 万美元，以了结美国联邦贸易委员会的多项指控，其中包括该公司欺骗了许多纳税人，让他们误以为可以免费在线报税。【原文：H&R Block agreed to pay $7 million to settle multiple U.S. Federal Trade Commission charges, including that it deceived many taxpayers into believing they could file their taxes online for free.】

item.title: 桥水联合首席投资官称目前持有美股是 "好事
item.description: 桥水联合投资公司（Bridgewater Associates）联席首席投资官卡伦-卡尼奥尔-坦布尔（Karen Karniol-Tambour）周二表示，持有美国股票是一件 "好事"，并称她预计当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）将带来强劲的经济增长。【原文：Bridgewater Associates Co-Chief Investment Officer Karen Karniol-Tambour said on Tuesday U.S. stocks are a "good thing" to hold, adding she expects robust economic growth under President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 卡什卡利称美联储政策 "限制性适度
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联邦储备银行行长尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他认为美国的货币政策目前 "限制性适度"，短期借贷成本继续拖累通胀和经济，但幅度不大。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve Bank President Neel Kashkari said he feels U.S. monetary policy is currently "modestly restrictive," with short-term borrowing costs continuing to slow inflation and the economy, but not by a lot.】

item.title: 美联储调查显示，美国银行第三季度贷款需求疲软
item.description: 美联储周二公布的一项调查显示，第三季度美国银行对一类关键的商业贷款需求疲软，而消费者信用卡和汽车贷款的需求状况也有所疲软。【原文：U.S. banks saw weaker demand for a key category of business loans during the third quarter, while the demand picture for consumer credit card and auto loans also softened, according to a Federal Reserve survey out on Tuesday that showed the Fed's pivot to lower interest rates has yet to improve credit demand.】

item.title: 美国银行首席执行官敦促特朗普政府解决美国预算问题
item.description: 美国银行首席执行官布莱恩-莫伊尼汉（Brian Moynihan）周二表示，他预计当选总统唐纳德-特朗普即将上任的政府将解决美国的预算问题。【原文：Bank of America CEO Brian Moynihan said on Tuesday he expected President-elect Donald Trump's incoming administration to tackle the U.S. budget.】

item.title: 西门子能源上调中期展望，扭亏为盈步伐加快
item.description: 西门子能源公司周二上调了中期业绩展望，该公司报告称，受电力设备需求增长和风力涡轮机部门持续扭亏为盈的推动，其订单量创下新纪录，第四季度亏损也有所收窄。【原文：Siemens Energy raised its midterm outlook on Tuesday as it reported a new record for its order book and a narrower fourth-quarter loss, boosted by rising demand for power equipment and an ongoing turnaround at its wind turbine unit.】

item.title: 消息人士称，特朗普之子小唐将加入风险投资公司 1789 Capital
item.description: 据熟悉当选总统唐纳德-特朗普计划的三位消息人士透露，他的长子小唐纳德-特朗普将加入风险投资公司 1789 Capital，该公司专注于投资保守派公司。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's eldest son, Donald Trump Jr., is joining venture capital firm 1789 Capital, which focuses on investing in conservative companies, according to three sources familiar with his plans.】

item.title: BBVA 的萨瓦德尔竞购陷入对竞争和墨西哥的担忧之中
item.description: 随着西班牙监管机构对 BBVA 的收购进行深入审查，BBVA 对萨瓦德尔的长期追逐变得更加漫长，在唐纳德-特朗普赢得美国大选后，萨瓦德尔的价值进一步下跌，这加剧了人们对其墨西哥业务的担忧。【原文：BBVA's long pursuit of Sabadell is becoming even longer, with Spanish regulators launching an in-depth review of its bid, which fell further in value after Donald Trump's U.S. election victory fuelled concerns over its Mexican business.】

item.title: 沙特 NEOM 长期首席执行官离职，沙特缩减大型项目规模
item.description: 沙特王储穆罕默德-本-萨勒曼（Mohammed bin Salman）发起的价值 5000 亿美元的沙特开发项目 NEOM 的长期首席执行官纳德米-纳斯尔（Nadhmi al-Nasr）已离职，NEOM 周二表示，但未说明原因。【原文：Nadhmi al-Nasr, the long-time chief executive of the $500 billion Saudi development project NEOM launched by Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, has departed, NEOM said on Tuesday without giving a reason.】

item.title: 消息人士称，空客即将与 Spirit Aero 就融资和付款条件达成协议
item.description: 一位熟知内情的人士透露，空中客车公司准备最早于本周三与陷入困境的航空航天供应商 Spirit Aerosystems 公司就新的融资和修订付款条件达成协议。【原文：Airbus is poised to finalise an agreement as early as Wednesday with struggling aerospace supplier Spirit Aerosystems on fresh funding and revised payment terms, a person familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 美国起诉阻止 UnitedHealth 以 33 亿美元收购 Amedisys
item.description: 美国司法部和美国三个州周二提起诉讼，要求阻止联合健康集团（UnitedHealth Group）斥资 33 亿美元收购 Amedisys 公司（Amedisys Inc），原因是担心该交易会损害家庭医疗服务市场的竞争。【原文：The Justice Department and three U.S. states filed a lawsuit on Tuesday to block UnitedHealth Group's $3.3 billion purchase of Amedisys Inc over concern the deal would harm competition in the market for home health services, the department said.】

item.title: 瑞士电信提出新方案以赢得意大利对沃达丰交易的批准
item.description: 路透社看到的一封信显示，瑞士电信在 10 月底向意大利反垄断机构提出了第二套补救措施，以争取意大利反垄断机构批准瑞士电信将其意大利子公司 Fastweb 与沃达丰在该国的资产合并的计划。【原文：Swisscom offered a second set of remedies to Italy's antitrust authority at the end of October to win approval for a planned deal to combine its Italian arm Fastweb with Vodafone assets in the country, a letter seen by Reuters showed.】

item.title: 高管称，特朗普政府可能会刺激大型银行交易
item.description: 金融高管和分析师周二表示，随着美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫，政府任命的监管机构对批准大型交易持更加开放的态度，这可能会迎来银行并购浪潮。【原文：President-elect Donald Trump's return to the White House could usher in a wave of bank mergers and acquisitions as the administration appoints regulators who are more open to approving larger deals, financial executives and analysts said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国联邦存款保险公司（FDIC）报告称，"银行存款不足 "的家庭更有可能拥有加密货币
item.description: 根据周二发布的一份政府报告，被认为是 "银行不足 "的美国家庭--或者依赖支票兑现和发薪日贷款等服务来满足其金融需求的家庭--比那些更容易接触到传统银行系统的家庭更有可能持有加密货币。【原文：American households considered "underbanked" -- or who rely on services like check cashing and payday loans to meet their financial needs -- are more likely to hold cryptocurrencies than households with better access to the traditional banking system, according to a government report released Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称，ValueAct 公司以 10 亿美元入股 Meta 公司
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二透露，对冲基金 ValueAct Capital 已入股 Facebook 和 Instagram 母公司 Meta Platforms，金额达 10 亿美元。【原文：Hedge fund ValueAct Capital has taken a $1 billion stake in Facebook and Instagram-parent Meta Platforms , a source familiar with the matter said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 波音罢工导致 10 月交付的喷气式飞机降至 14 架
item.description: 波音公司周二表示，在长达数周的罢工导致其大部分飞机生产停止后，该公司在 10 月份交付了 14 架商用喷气式飞机，不到 2023 年同期交付给客户的 34 架喷气式飞机的一半。【原文：Boeing said on Tuesday it delivered 14 commercial jets in October, less than half of the 34 jets it handed over to customers during the same month in 2023, after a weeks-long strike halted most of its aircraft production.】
